SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT DESERTIONNO , FILENAME , DATE_FORMAT(HAPPENDT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS HAPPENDT , HAPPENPLACE , KINDCD , COLORCD , AGE , WEIGHT , NOTICENO , NOTICESDT , NOTICEEDT , POPFILE , PROCESSSTATE , CASE WHEN SEXCD = 'M' THEN '수컷' WHEN SEXCD = 'F' THEN '암컷' ELSE '미상' END AS SEXCD , CASE WHEN NEUTERYN = 'Y' THEN '예' WHEN NEUTERYN = 'N' THEN '아니오' ELSE '미상' END AS NEUTERYN , SPECIALMARK , CARENM , CARETEL , CAREADDR , ORGNM , CHARGENM , OFFICETEL , NOTICECOMMENT , '' AS RTN_URL FROM ADOPT_ANIMAL_INFO WHERE DESERTIONNO = #{DESERTIONNO} UNION ALL SELECT DESERTIONNO , FILENAME , DATE_FORMAT(HAPPENDT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS HAPPENDT , HAPPENPLACE , KINDCD , COLORCD , AGE , WEIGHT , NOTICENO , NOTICESDT , NOTICEEDT , POPFILE , PROCESSSTATE , CASE WHEN SEXCD = 'M' THEN '수컷' WHEN SEXCD = 'F' THEN '암컷' ELSE '미상' END AS SEXCD , CASE WHEN NEUTERYN = 'Y' THEN '예' WHEN NEUTERYN = 'N' THEN '아니오' ELSE '미상' END AS NEUTERYN , SPECIALMARK , CARENM , CARETEL , CAREADDR , ORGNM , CHARGENM , OFFICETEL , NOTICECOMMENT , '' AS RTN_URL FROM FIND_ANIMAL_INFO WHERE DESERTIONNO = #{DESERTIONNO} UNION ALL SELECT DESERTIONNO , FILENAME , DATE_FORMAT(HAPPENDT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS HAPPENDT , HAPPENPLACE , KINDCD , COLORCD , AGE , WEIGHT , NOTICENO , NOTICESDT , NOTICEEDT , POPFILE , PROCESSSTATE , CASE WHEN SEXCD = 'M' THEN '수컷' WHEN SEXCD = 'F' THEN '암컷' ELSE '미상' END AS SEXCD , CASE WHEN NEUTERYN = 'Y' THEN '예' WHEN NEUTERYN = 'N' THEN '아니오' ELSE '미상' END AS NEUTERYN , SPECIALMARK , CARENM , CARETEL , CAREADDR , ORGNM , CHARGENM , OFFICETEL , NOTICECOMMENT , RTN_URL FROM COPY_ANIMAL_INFO WHERE DESERTIONNO = #{DESERTIONNO} )T LIMIT 1
